originalText.text: It was truly a gift to have Stephanie guide me through the two sessions I had with her. She helped me find clarity with paramount life issues and her intuition & guidance were spot on. I'm so grateful for the benevolent space to help me through challenges and finding great resolution through these sessions.

originalText.text: I had a reading today and was floored. She was picking up on my exact situation in a Live video BEFORE it was even my turn to be read. When she started reading my question, she couldn't have been more spot on with how I am thinking at the moment. She read the person's character I was inquiring about perfectly and even told me something that I have said myself to others. She is definitely in tune and uses her gifts to help and uplift. I have been watching her for awhile and always enjoy her messages. I feel honored to have recieved my very own today! Thank you Reverend Stephanie Wild! Many Blessingsüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôè

text.text: I had a reading today and was floored. She was picking up on my exact situation in a Live video BEFORE it was even my turn to be read. When she started reading my question, she couldn't have been more spot on with how I am thinking at the moment. She read the person's character I was inquiring about perfectly and even told me something that I have said myself to others. She is definitely in tune and uses her gifts to help and uplift. I have been watching her for awhile and always enjoy her messages. I feel honored to have recieved my very own today! Thank you Reverend Stephanie Wild! Many Blessingsüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôèüôè

originalText.text:
I met Rev through a cousin of mine and had periodic tarot readings from her EXTREMELY accurate. Then we just had a talk on the side about my life while asking her about her services she can provide at a distance since am in Gaborone, Botswana(Africa). She did a clearing  on me, where do I even start guys . There was that DRAMATIC change in my inner happiness,laughing and smiling became so easy for me. I am so excited about it because I was in a bit of a dark deep time was going on with life inhaling oxygen exhaling carbon dioxide, eating , going to  work and sleeping.  But now there is that excitement of knowing I can do far much better. My relationships  with people close to me have seen a tremendous improvement. I BASICALLY LOOK FORWARD TO DOING THIS THING CALLED LIFE. Thanks Rev thanks a lot I will continually improve am so grateful as my conduit for gratitude,happiness and abundance
becomes wider and wider.

originalText.text:
Thank you thank you  from Montevideo Uruguay.
I am Cristina, Katy s friend( your school friend)
I found the brooch, as soon as I read your messages I run to the room ( the farthest to the right) opened the socks  drawer ,no luck!!
But all of the sudden I remembered I had put some socks away and yes there inside a sock was the brooch inside a pouch that looks like a handkerchief!!!
Just as you said it!!!!
It took me five minutes to find it!!!
I have been looking  for it since October 2018
I knew I had put somewhere in that closet in that room!!!!
Thank you thank you
It has a enormous sentimental value
I do go to NY quite often as my youngest lives there
I would love to meet you
Merry Christmas
Love
Cristina Hanmer

originalText.text:
Amazing I called my friend Reverend Stephanie Wild to help a friend of mine who could not find a brooch of her Mother in Laws in Uruguay since October 2018 and within 10 minutes tonight we found it. Truly incredible thank you do much Steph. Un bedos
Katie Herbert xx
